name: Dynamic FAQ
author: Irene A. Mitchell

sections.description:
A simple yet dynamic faq page that can be added in your navigation menu without adding any code to your existing theme. It uses JQUERY and AJAX to make the contents more dynamic without affecting the current page. It inherits your themes lay-out (CSS) and automatically modifies the page layout to give way for your published questions with corresponding answers.
If no javascript is enabled, the contents will display like a blog archive.
sections.installation:
Manual Installation

  1. Download this plugin.
  2. Activate then start writing your FAQs.
  3. Create questions with answers and publish it.

Note: If no questions were created, only the FAQ title will be visible to your end-user
sections.faq:
If javascript is disabled, will this plugin still works

Yes, it will still work but will display like an archive or category format

short_description: Dynamic faq page with very own WYSIWYG editor.
